sentences.en: I dopped my first year at varsity.
sentences.cn: 我在大学的第一年学习很糟糕。

sentences.en: By the end of that first year, I knew how totally unsuited we were to each other.
sentences.cn: 第一年年末的时候，我就知道我们彼此完全不合适。

sentences.en: The first year of the course was an absolute doddle.
sentences.cn: 第一年的课程简直太容易了。
